text: The other day I was looking for the canonical states.opml file, the one that I use to test structures of outlines with. I found what appears to be the original copy, dated 12/2/2000. It's now accessible through this.how, which is served by PagePark, using its built-in ability to render OPML files. I'm rebooting the worldoutline capabilities but with an open source scalable stack. :rocket:
